title: Rehabilitation tenements allotted to beneficiaries shall not be transferable for first fifteen years
clause_text: Rehabilitation tenements allotted to beneficiaries shall not be transferable for first fifteen years, except with prior permission of Commissioner, who may grant such permission in case of hardship, on payment of premium as below :
section: Process of Allotment to Beneficiaries and Conditions thereof :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
